medical_history.chief_complaint: Crampy right lower quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started yesterday afternoon shortly after eating a hamburger and was progressively worsening over the evening. The patient tried simethicone without relief and continued to feel bloated. The pain worsened with standing and has not migrated. In the morning, there was some improvement, but the pain worsened again when he went to work.
medical_history.family_history: Noncontributory; no personal or family history of gastrointestinal cancer, IBD, or other GI disorders.
